snippet.title: After The Collapse : Early Access Trailer
snippet.description:
After The Collapse: a post-apocalyptic base building game. It will be released in Autumn 2018 on Steam Early Access.

More information at https://www.anarkisgaming.com

Credits:
Music by Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
Licensed under Creative Commons: By Attribution 3.0 License
http://creativecommons.org/licenses/b...
